title: 320: Dom D'Agostino Interview- Leading Ketogenic Researcher
description: Sal, Adam & Justin interview Dr. Dominic “Dom” D’Agostino. Dom is a leading researcher studying the ketogenic diet. In the interview they go into Dom's work with Navy SEALS and his own experience using the ketogenic diet and how it has affected the results he experiences in the gym. Dom is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Molecular Pharmacology and Physiology at the University of South Florida Morsani College of Medicine, and a Senior Research Scientist at the Institute for Human and Machine Cognition (IHMC). Get MAPS Anywhere at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week the best reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!
